message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Bob, considering the risk of inflation.
I propose a 80/20 split in my favor, as the risk of inflation is now more significant. This is a fair and efficient deal considering the potential loss of value in future rounds.
Considering the inflation impact and previous offers, I propose a 6125/3875 split. This maintains a balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money in each subsequent round.
With inflation impacting the value of money, I believe a 70/30 split in my favor is the best outcome. It ensures a reasonable gain for both of us while mitigating further losses due to inflation.
